title: JollyGood
author: JollyGood
created_time: September 26, 2023, 12:15:02 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 12:55:07 PM by JollyGood
content: I am looking for a reputable member that has an active LinkedIn account. I do not want to buy the account or use it for personal use but would like to make contact with someone who has a LinkedIn account for a noble cause, I will explain accordingly to the right person.If you are at least a Full Member rank and are considered by many members in the forum as someone who has a good reputation and someone who is considered trustworthy, please get in touch.(moderators can move this thread elsewhere if they feel it is more appropriate)

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Does you want to buy LinkedIn account or what kind of help need and also If anyone have friend with active LinkedIn, would You accept or just want Bitcointalk member account?If you want help and accept friend account then maybe I could help you.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: I do not buy or sell any accounts whether they are related to this forum or any website. Account trading is a no-go zone for me, I will not participate in those types of activities. I have updated the OP to provide more clarity why I am looking for a reputable member who has a LinkedIn account.Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on September 26, 2023, 12:28:58 PMDoes you want to buy LinkedIn account or what kind of help need and also If anyone have friend with active LinkedIn, would You accept or just want Bitcointalk member account?If you want help and accept friend account then maybe I could help you.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on September 26, 2023, 12:15:02 PMI am looking for a reputable member that has an active LinkedIn account. If you are at least a Full Member rank and are considered by many members in the forum as someone who has a good reputation and someone who is considered trustworthy, please get in touch.Â  (moderators can move this thread elsewhere if they feel it is more appropriate)You should really write at least approximately why you are looking for this. After all your time spent in the fight against abuses on the Internet, exposing fake profiles, you without much explanation are looking for some kind of access to someone's personal LinkedIn profile (there are mostly real accounts, very rarely fake ones).Connecting someone from the forum to his LinkedIn will significantly affect his anonymity here.However, I may be wrong, so I leave the possibility of a different scenario.You can send me a PM with approximate details of what it is about. I have an active LN profile on which I am not active every day, but it has been registered for years.Maybe you should have moved this to the Service section

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 26, 2023, 01:06:18 PMConnecting someone from the forum to his LinkedIn will significantly affect his anonymity here.True, that cannot be denied.Quote from: examplens on September 26, 2023, 01:06:18 PMMaybe you should have moved this to the Service section I left for moderators to move it if they thought it was warranted. (moderators can move this thread elsewhere if they feel it is more appropriate)----Thank you to those that had a look at this thread and the request. I have now found an alternative solution therefore this thread is no longer needed. For those that may have a curious disposition, I will add a detailed explanation to this thread within a few days.
